Verses: 1 balavaangalin Puththirare, Karththarukku Magimaiyaiyum Vallamaiyaiyum Seluththungal; Karththarukke Adhaich Seluththungal.
2 karththarudaiya Naamaththirkuriya Magimaiyai Avarukkuch Seluththungal; Parisuththa Alangaaraththudane Karththaraith Thozhudhukollungal.
3 karththarudaiya Saththam Thanneergalinmel Dhonikkiradhu; Magimaiyulla Dhevan Muzhangugiraar; Karththar Thiralaana Thanneergalinmel Irukkiraar.
4 karththarudaiya Saththam Vallamaiyulladhu; Karththarudaiya Saththam Magaththuvamulladhu.
5 karththarudaiya Saththam Kedhurumarangalai Murikkiradhu; Karththar Leebanonin Kedhurumarangalai Murikkiraar.
6 avaigalaik Kandrukkuttigalaippolavum, Leebanonaiyum Seeriyonaiyum Gaandaamirugak Kuttigalaippolavum Thullappannugiraar.
8 karththarudaiya Saththam Vanaandharaththai Adhirappannum; Karththar Kaadhes Vanaandharaththai Adhirappannugiraar.
9 karththarudaiya Saththam Penmaangalai Eenumbadi Seydhu, Kaadugalai Veliyaakkum; Avarudaiya Aalayaththilulla Yaavarum Avarudaiya Magimaiyaip Pirasthaabikkiraargal.
10 karththar Jalappiravaagaththinmel Utkaarndhirukkiraar; Karththar Endrendraikkum Raajaavaaga Veetrirukkiraar.
11 karththar Thamadhu Janaththirkup Belankoduppaar; Karththar Thamadhu Janaththirkuch Samaadhaanam Aruli, Avargalai Aaseervadhippaar.
